title: Bloomberg Markets: Sentient Jet CEO on Business `Thriving'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sentient Jet CEO on Business `Thriving'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Andrew Collins President/CEO Sentient Jet Discussing seeing a 20% growth in sales and 15% increase in volume, as well as travel to the Kentucky Derby.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
